attributes.action: Stop the over 65s working & give the young a chance .
attributes.additional_details:
We call upon this government to hold a urgent debate in parliament to discuss new ways to help the 1 million young people who are currently un-employed

We firmly believe that " tax restrictions " should be placed on all of those people who choose to work past the age of 65

We firmly believe that the retirement age should be fixed at 65 , for ALL PUBLIC SECTOR WORKERS

1 -   Some public sector workers continue to work past 65 , because they have no hobbies or friends

2 - Some public sector worker continue to work past 65 , to escape from un-happy relationships

3 - Some public sector workers continue to work past 65 , because they like having lots of money

We call upon the government to significantly increase the taxes for those wealthy public sector workers , who choose to work past the age of 65

Lots of young & un-employed people are now suffering with depression . Please sign this petition & give some " HOPE " to the young & un-employed
